section.markdown: Note these series are non-seasonally adjusted. The export proportions are calculated from the proportion of total sales which are reported as exports in the Monthly Business Survey (MBS).

description.title: Export proportions for manufacturing industries
description.summary: Export proportions for  the manufacturing industries collected by the Monthly Business Survey (MBS) at industry level.
description.metaDescription: Export proportions for the manufacturing industries collected by the Monthly Business Survey (MBS) at industry level.
